abstract: Daniel Olusola "Danny" Shittu (born 2 September 1980) is a Nigerian footballer who is currently playing for Millwall for the second time in his career.
comment: Daniel Olusola "Danny" Shittu (born 2 September 1980) is a Nigerian footballer who is currently playing for Millwall for the second time in his career.
